name: datapi
title: DataPi Home Page
description: Modernized home page for DataPi Learning Centre. Built from scratch using AngularJS and Bootstrap CSS.

name: primus
title: Primus
description: Web application for simplifying administrative tasks at Datapi Learning Centre. Utilizes Firebase, a realtime database and backend on the cloud, to allow for data access from virtually anywhere.

name: huddle
title: Huddle
description: Exceptionally flexible platform built for Gobind Sarvar, a non-for-profit learning institute, to manage their international conferences and events.

name: yippee
title: Yippee
description: A hybrid mobile application that encourages users to live a healthy lifestyle by scheduling regular breaks into their busy schedules. Includes chat functionality to communicate and organize break destinations, using the integrated Yelp API, with other users.
